condition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<salarygrade xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/" grade="SQL:T.GRADE">
    <!--columns of SALARYGRADE as T-->
    <losal>SQL:T.LOSAL</losal>
    <hisal>SQL:T.HISAL</hisal>
</salarygrade>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<employee xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/" empno="SQL:T.EMPNO">
    <!--columns of EMPLOYEE as T-->
    <name>SQL:T.NAME</name>
    <job>SQL:T.JOB</job>
    <hiredate>SQL:T.HIREDATE</hiredate>
    <comm>SQL:T.COMM</comm>
    <!--associated SALARYGRADE row-->
    <j:assoc>SALARY</j:assoc>
    <!--associated DEPARTMENT row-->
    <j:assoc>DEPARTMENT</j:assoc>
    <!--associated EMPLOYEE row-->
    <j:assoc>BOSS</j:assoc>
    <!--associated PROJECT_PARTICIPATION rows-->
    <j:assoc>inverse-EMPLOYEE</j:assoc>
</employee>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<role xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/">
    <!--columns of ROLE as T-->
    <role_description>SQL:T.DESCRIPTION</role_description>
</role>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<project xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/">
    <!--columns of PROJECT as T-->
    <project_description>SQL:T.DESCRIPTION</project_description>
    <project_start_date>SQL:T.START_DATE</project_start_date>
    <project_end_date>SQL:T.END_DATE</project_end_date>
</project>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<project_participation xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/">
    <!--columns of PROJECT_PARTICIPATION as T-->
    <start_date>SQL:T.START_DATE</start_date>
    <end_date>SQL:T.END_DATE</end_date>
    <!--associated ROLE row-->
    <j:assoc>ROLE</j:assoc>
    <!--associated PROJECT row-->
    <j:assoc>PROJECT</j:assoc>
</project_participation>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<department xmlns:j="http://jailer.sf.net/" deptno="SQL:T.DEPTNO">
    <!--columns of DEPARTMENT as T-->
    <name>SQL:T.NAME</name>
    <location>SQL:T.LOCATION</location>
</department>
